tests.name: Student name is filled in
tests.run: python3 -c "import json; data = json.load(open('verification_result.json')); assert data['student_name'] != 'REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_NAME', 'Student name not filled in'"

tests.name: Verification passed
tests.run: python3 -c "import json; data = json.load(open('verification_result.json')); assert data['verification_passed'] == True, 'Verification did not pass'"
